Articles.Content:
experimented with a plane last night, anyone else getting weird clicking sounds from the jet engines?

like the sound file is corrupted

3 hours ago, Leopard said:

experimented with a plane last night, anyone else getting weird clicking sounds from the jet engines?

like the sound file is corrupted

Yeah I had this with the rapiers also. It was like a crackling popping noise for me.

At first I just pretented Bob was making popcorn while Jeb flew the ssto to orbit.

But after a few missions with the ssto it does get annoying. I've stopped using my ssto atm , atleast until the new update , partly due to this but mainly due to not having physics time warp. Doing burns with the nuclear  engines is just a pain.

So hopefully the next patch will also have a fix for the sound bugs.
cheers, nice to know its not just me, on the up side it amused the moggies no end
Nice one. I was gonna post to ask. I don't have to replace my TV now. Yay
